group.name: Exhibitors
group.announcementMessage:
Welcome to the Exhibitor Centre

Every exhibitor at IDWSC has extra opportunities to grow their business through the event app. Here’s how to unlock the full potential of the app and get prepared before attendees access the app.

Boost your brand’s visibility on the official exhibitor listing by adding your logo, company description, contact details, business category, social media links, and more.

Enhance your networking potential by adding a profile picture and updating your bio to highlight your industry expertise and connect with relevant attendees.

Showcase your offerings on the official product listing by adding your company’s products and services along with images.

Assign and manage your team leads to track engagement, schedule meetings, and follow up efficiently. Use qualification questions to identify high-potential prospects.

Download App

Please contact support if you need any help regarding the event app.

name: Water & Irrigation Systems
description: Waisco – Water & Irrigation Systems Co. Ltd.A leading Saudi company specialized in water pumping and irrigation solutions, and the exclusive distributor of Calpeda Italian pumps in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.We provide a full range of pumps, pressure tanks, control panels, and advanced water management systems designed for residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural applications.At Waisco, we focus on delivering high-efficiency solutions with world-class Italian quality, supported by on-site services including installation, maintenance, and technical support to ensure long-lasting performance.We are committed to supporting Saudi Vision 2030 by offering innovative technologies that enhance water sustainability and strengthen water infrastructure across the Kingdom.
htmlDescription:
Waisco – Water & Irrigation Systems Co. Ltd.

A leading Saudi company specialized in water pumping and irrigation solutions, and the exclusive distributor of Calpeda Italian pumps in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

We provide a full range of pumps, pressure tanks, control panels, and advanced water management systems designed for residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural applications.


At Waisco, we focus on delivering high-efficiency solutions with world-class Italian quality, supported by on-site services including installation, maintenance, and technical support to ensure long-lasting performance.

We are committed to supporting Saudi Vision 2030 by offering innovative technologies that enhance water sustainability and strengthen water infrastructure across the Kingdom.

name: Group 5 Pipe Saudi Co
description: Group Five Pipe Saudi is manufacturing Helical Submerged Arc Welded (HSAW) Pipes, for various purposes, including water transmission, Oil & Gas, Construction and Pilling applications.Our Helical Submerged Arc Welded (HSAW) pipes are a common and effective solution for water transmission, particularly in large-scale infrastructure projects. HSAW pipes offer a balance of cost-effectiveness, manufacturing efficiency, and performance capabilities, making them a preferred choice for the water transmission application. The unique helical (spiral) weld pattern helps distribute stress evenly around the pipe, contributing to high structural integrity and the ability to withstand significant pressure and external loads. When manufactured to international standards (e.g., API 5L, AWWA, ASTM), HSAW Pipes offer a long service life and reliable performance. Our production range is given as under:•	Pipe OD (Outside Diameter) o	API Specs : 20 inch – 100 inches o	Non-API Specs : 20 inch – 120 inches •	Pipe WT (Wall Thickness) o	0.25 inch – 1 inch (6.35mm – 25.4mm) •	Pipe Length o	10m – 24m (32.8ft – 80ft) •	API Grades o	Grade B ~ X70 o	Non-Sour
htmlDescription:
Group Five Pipe Saudi is manufacturing Helical Submerged Arc Welded (HSAW) Pipes, for various purposes, including water transmission, Oil & Gas, Construction and Pilling applications.

Our Helical Submerged Arc Welded (HSAW) pipes are a common and effective solution for water transmission, particularly in large-scale infrastructure projects. HSAW pipes offer a balance of cost-effectiveness, manufacturing efficiency, and performance capabilities, making them a preferred choice for the water transmission application. The unique helical (spiral) weld pattern helps distribute stress evenly around the pipe, contributing to high structural integrity and the ability to withstand significant pressure and external loads. When manufactured to international standards (e.g., API 5L, AWWA, ASTM), HSAW Pipes offer a long service life and reliable performance. Our production range is given as under:

• Pipe OD (Outside Diameter)

o API Specs : 20 inch – 100 inches

o Non-API Specs : 20 inch – 120 inches

• Pipe WT (Wall Thickness)

o 0.25 inch – 1 inch (6.35mm – 25.4mm)

• Pipe Length

o 10m – 24m (32.8ft – 80ft)

• API Grades

o Grade B ~ X70

o Non-Sour

name: GI Aqua Tech
description: GI AQUA TECH provides innovative wastewater treatment solutions, committed to a sustainable future for people and planet. With a human-centered approach, we deliver four models of wastewater treatment — mobile stations, portable plants, scalable stationary units, and new-generation medium and large-scale solutions — all designed for efficiency, flexibility, and cost-effectiveness. Our technologies serve domestic, industrial, concrete, slaughterhouse, leachate, poultry, petroleum & oil, and specialized sectors. At the forefront of our innovation is the award-winning G-NANO technology, a non-biological treatment system that overcomes the limits of conventional processes. Plug-and-play, it starts immediately, delivers treatment in 3–5 minutes, and consumes just 0.2 kWh/m³. Compact, odor-free, and resilient to fluctuations, G-NANO sets a new benchmark for speed, adaptability, and sustainability.
htmlDescription:
GI AQUA TECH provides innovative wastewater treatment solutions, committed to a sustainable future for people and planet.

With a human-centered approach, we deliver four models of wastewater treatment — mobile stations, portable plants, scalable stationary units, and new-generation medium and large-scale solutions — all designed for efficiency, flexibility, and cost-effectiveness. Our technologies serve domestic, industrial, concrete, slaughterhouse, leachate, poultry, petroleum & oil, and specialized sectors.

At the forefront of our innovation is the award-winning G-NANO technology, a non-biological treatment system that overcomes the limits of conventional processes. Plug-and-play, it starts immediately, delivers treatment in 3–5 minutes, and consumes just 0.2 kWh/m³. Compact, odor-free, and resilient to fluctuations, G-NANO sets a new benchmark for speed, adaptability, and sustainability.

I hold a bachelor’s degree in Mechatronics Engineering and a master’s degree in Electronics Engineering. Currently, I work as a lecturer faculty member at the Hail College of Technology in and serve as the supervisor of the college’s Talent and Innovation Club.

I have a strong passion for prototyping and a broad interest in mechanics and electronics. My experience spans various fields, including:
	•	Designing electronic circuits and PCB layouts.
	•	Programming microcontrollers.
	•	Developing small-scale machine learning models (TinyML).
	•	Mechanical design.
	•	CAD design and drafting.
	•	3D printing.
	•	Robotics.
	•	Scientific research.

I have successfully worked on diverse projects across different domains, starting from conceptualizing ideas and defining clear specifications to preparing requirement lists and executing practical implementations.

name: Wellness Duniya Industry
description: About Wellness Dunya IndustryWellness Dunya Industry is a Saudi company specializing in smart sanitation, water technologies, and sustainable infrastructure solutions. The company develops and manufactures advanced public smart toilets (Soilet®), atmospheric water generation systems, and digital IoT-enabled platforms designed to enhance operational efficiency and reduce environmental impact. Through strong partnerships with government entities and innovation centers, Wellness Dunya Industry aims to localize modern technologies, improve public services, and support Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030 in sustainability, industrial growth, and smart city development.
htmlDescription:
About Wellness Dunya Industry

Wellness Dunya Industry is a Saudi company specializing in smart sanitation, water technologies, and sustainable infrastructure solutions. The company develops and manufactures advanced public smart toilets (Soilet®), atmospheric water generation systems, and digital IoT-enabled platforms designed to enhance operational efficiency and reduce environmental impact. Through strong partnerships with government entities and innovation centers, Wellness Dunya Industry aims to localize modern technologies, improve public services, and support Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030 in sustainability, industrial growth, and smart city development.

members.biography:
Eng. Saad Mohammed Alahmari is a Saudi entrepreneur, industrial innovator, and founder of Wellness Dunya Industries, a rapidly growing manufacturing and technology group dedicated to transforming the water, sanitation, and sustainability sectors in alignment with Saudi Vision 2030. Driven by a mission to localize advanced technologies and build globally competitive Saudi products, Saad has established a diverse portfolio of ventures spanning smart sanitation systems, atmospheric water generation, desalination solutions, digital platforms, and product design engineering.

Saad’s journey reflects a blend of strategic vision, hands-on execution, and cross-sector collaboration. Through his flagship product line Soilet®, he introduced one of the region’s first locally manufactured smart public toilet systems, integrating IoT dashboards, solar energy, automated self-cleaning technologies, payment systems, and high-durability modular structures. His work positioned Soilet® as a uniquely Saudi solution capable of serving high-traffic environments, religious sites, highways, municipalities, festivals, and tourism destinations. Today, Soilet® is recognized for bridging global innovation with local manufacturing capability—offering mobile units, ready-made cabins, retrofit kits, and hybrid concepts developed with engineering partners in India, Europe, and Japan.

Under Wellness Dunya Industries, Saad expanded into water innovation through H2O Cloud / H2OGo, pioneering atmospheric water generation carts, decentralized water supply systems, and solar-powered hydration stations. His collaboration with Japanese partners under Zetta Water introduced advanced desalination concepts, nanofiber membranes, and compact water solutions aimed at agriculture, industry, and rural communities. 

Saad’s work is deeply integrated with academia and government. He maintains a long-term partnership many govrements and acadimic sectors , supporting R&D projects, student capstones, prototyping programs, and applied research in IoT, materials science, and environmental engineering. His companies frequently participate in national innovation events, including Biban Forum, IDWSC, and FMEX, showcasing Saudi-made technologies to government agencies, investors, and global partners.


As a leader, Saad is known for his multi-disciplinary approach: blending engineering, business development, branding, product design, and operational planning. He has built internal teams spanning operations, IoT development, product design, international sourcing, and manufacturing partnerships. His entrepreneurial reach extends to retail (electric bikes & accessories), logistics innovation, and digital transformation initiatives that include IoT dashboards, SaaS platforms, and AI-driven service models.

Beyond business, Saad embodies the new wave of Saudi industrial leaders—innovators who combine global exposure with deep national commitment. His projects reflect a consistent philosophy: solve real-world problems, build Saudi capabilities, and create lasting economic and environmental impact. Whether developing a new self-cleaning mechanism, optimizing the cost structure of an AWG cart, designing modular toilet systems for mass deployment, or structuring a JV with international partners, Saad’s work remains rooted in purposeful innovation.

With rapidly expanding regional partnerships and a growing international footprint, Saad continues to lead Wellness Dunya Industries toward becoming a reference point for smart water and sanitation technologies, industrial product innovation, and local manufacturing excellence. His trajectory demonstrates that ambitious national goals can be achieved through vision, persistence, and the ability to connect engineering with entrepreneurship—pushing Saudi-made solutions onto the global stage.

name: Smart Ric
description: Smart Ric provides an innovative solution for the treatment and desalination of groundwater with high salinity and naturally occurring radioactive materials (NORM). The system utilizes locally developed adsorbent materials, selective adsorption technology, and solar-powered desalination to deliver an efficient, cost-effective, and sustainable water treatment process with minimal brine discharge. This national innovation aims to enhance water quality, protect the environment, and recover valuable resources within a circular-economy framework.

This national innovation aims to enhance water quality, protect the environment, and recover valuable resources within a circular-economy framework.

Every exhibitor at IDWSC has extra opportunities to grow their business through the event app. Here’s how to unlock the full potential of the app and get prepared before attendees access the app.

Boost your brand’s visibility on the official exhibitor listing by adding your logo, company description, contact details, business category, social media links, and more.

Enhance your networking potential by adding a profile picture and updating your bio to highlight your industry expertise and connect with relevant attendees.

Showcase your offerings on the official product listing by adding your company’s products and services along with images.

Assign and manage your team leads to track engagement, schedule meetings, and follow up efficiently. Use qualification questions to identify high-potential prospects.

Download App

Please contact support if you need any help regarding the event app.
